DOC.brief_summary: Prospective evaluation of sleep in children admitted to the Intensive Care Unit at Nationwide Children's Hospital to determine how children sleep while admitted to the Intensive Care Unit
DOC.criteria: Any patient admitted to the Intensive Care Unit, or soon to be admitted to the ICU Age from 0 days to 17 years 364 days at the time of enrollment Any patient with anticipated ICU stay of at least overnight with a minimum of 12 hours duration Any patient with Admitted with Traumatic Brain Injury, Admitted with an Active Seizure Disorder, Severe Developmental Delay that might impair normal sleep architecture, Known abnormal EEG, any patient actively receiving Mechanical Ventilation
